titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Weatherhouse - 1947-11-29 - Part 2 // Duck Head Work Clothes - 1947-11-29 - Part 1

mods.abstract: Part 2 of excerpts from a Weatherhouse sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (10:15-10:30 pm) from November 29, 1947. Featuring David Cobb (host), and performer Roy Acuff. Followed by part 1 of excerpts from a Duck Head Work Clothes sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (10:30-10:45 pm) from November 29, 1947. Featuring Louie Buck (host), with performers Milton Estes, and Cowboy Copas. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
